string.s: This is an official notice by the king
All knights should report to duty this saturday,## September the 4th,## for the official promotion of out new Champion,## the Queen Veneria.
This event is mandatory,## and tardiness will not be tolerated.
%Huh# .# .# . #######$I'm already late! I better run!
Huh?### What's this?
A tutorial on how to#% walk? $Who needs this?
How to walk:
Use## your## legs.
Actually:
WASD - Movement
Arrow Keys - Attack - using your character attack pattern, for exemple, diagonals using left+up and so on... You'll figure it out. This consumes your Stamina (the green bar)!
Space - Special Move - different for every character, you'll have to try them out and see what each of them do. This consumes your Mana (the blue bar)!
E - Pause
Now, to progress, attack me!
Geez, what a weird sign...
Guess I'll kill it then!
What's that up ahead?!
$+You!
Are you with king Edgar?
Of course!
Then die!+
+What?!
%I wonder why that knight attacked me...
%+Crap!## $There are more up ahead!+
I guess I'll just have to beat them up to get an answer!+
You!
Yeah, I get it now,# +come on!
You there,## Pawn!
I saw you fighting the other knights--
$Your Majesty,## I was only defending myself!
Then whose side are you on?
Yours,## obviously!
Fantastic!## Join me,## and I'll explain after we're done with these deserters...
+King Edgar has joined your party!
$Press E to open Character Select screen and use SPACE to select another character!
$Also, you can use this blue guy here to train your habilities! He won't attack you!
The new Champion turned against the kingdom## in the middle of the cerimony.
Turns out,## she had the whole military on her side,## except for you,## apparently.
Now## she's on her way to the castle,## I need to go stop her while I still can.
The Champion?## I always thought they were the best of the best,## our greatests warriors...
Indeed they were,## 10 years ago...
She was supposed to be the first new Champion of this decade. All the old ones have retired.
...####Can you defeat her?
%I fear not,## but I must try...
The kingdom is mine now, Edgar!
You and your little Pawn friend have no choice but to conform to the new Law -- me!
Rooks, +kill them!
She ran away...
Thank you warrior, for standing by my side. But now, we must part ways.
Go back to your family and leave this kingdom, I fear nowhere is safe anymore.
King Edgar has left your party!
One year later...
